title: Hello, the camera stopped working on my Pixel 2 XL, the black screen, the application interface is t
content: Hello, the camera stopped working on my Pixel 2 XL, the black screen, the application interface is there.  The selfie camera and the main one do not work.  The application cache has been cleared.  The phone is restarted, the camera does not work in safe mode either.  Many Pixel owners have had this problem.  Please help me to solve this problem.
